import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import Logo from "../images/noMoreWasteLogo.svg"; import axios from "axios"; const Signup = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ businessname: "", address: "", username: "", phone_number: "", email: "", password: "", role: "r", }) const handleChange = e =>{ setInputs(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } const handleSubmit = async e =>{ e.preventDefault() try{ const res = await axios.post("http:///api/auth/signup", inputs) console.log(res) } catch(err){ console.log(err) } } return (
